explanation: [0-0] Three bottles of beverages are placed side by side on gray tiles. From left to right are Sprite, Coca-Cola, and Fanta. Next to them are a patch of green grass and some plants.
[0-3] Next, three hands each holding a white strip are simultaneously placed into the three bottles.
